metadata.title: CVE-2017-5548 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: drivers/net/ieee802154/atusb.c in the Linux kernel 4.9.x before 4.9.6interacts incorrectly with the CONFIG_VMAP_STACK option, which allows localusers to cause a denial of service (system crash or memory corruption) orpossibly have unspecified other impact by leveraging use of more than onevirtual page for a DMA scatterlist.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.

linux-lts-wily: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
